mapper.select: SELECT *, User.name as writerName, User.img as writerImg FROM Recomment JOIN User ON Recomment.writerId = User.id WHERE commentId=#{commentId} AND deletedAt IS NULL;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Recomment(commentId, recommentId, content, writerId, isAnonymous) VALUES (#{commentId}, #{recommentId}, #{content}, #{writerId}, #{isAnonymous})
mapper.delete: UPDATE Recomment SET deletedAt = now() WHERE recommentId=#{recommentId}
mapper.update: UPDATE Recomment SET content=#{content}, isAnonymous=#{isAnonymous}, isModified=1 WHERE recommentId=#{recommentId}
